text: Pagan Fury is a Swedish folk metal music group. The group released their first music single Until the Day We Die in 2018. Pagan Fury participated in Melodifestivalen 2019 with the song "Stormbringer" and they placed seventh in the semifinal. ==Discography== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! scope="col" rowspan="2"| Title ! scope="col" rowspan="2"| Year ! scope="col" colspan="1"| Peak chart positions ! scope="col" rowspan="2"| Album |- ! scope="col" style="width:3em;font- size:85%;"| SWE Heat. |- ! scope="row"| "Stormbringer" | 2019 | 1 | |} ==References== Category:Swedish music
title: Pagan Fury
